title: Celestial Patron

source.file: docs/sources/phb2024/04-chapter 3/05-Character Classes (Continued) - Playerâ€™s Handbook - Dungeons & Dragons - Sources - D&D Beyond.pdf

effects: You always have the spells in the Celestial Spells table prepared at the warlock levels shown.
You have a pool of d6s for healing; the number of dice equals 1 + your Warlock level.
You can heal yourself or one creature you can see within 60 feet by expending dice from the pool (maximum dice at once equals your Charisma modifier, minimum 1).
Roll the expended dice; the target regains hit points equal to the total.
limits: You regain all expended dice when you finish a long rest.

effects: You have resistance to radiant damage.
Once per turn when a spell you cast deals radiant or fire damage, you can add your Charisma modifier to one of the spell’s damage rolls against a target.

feature_defs.trigger: when you use Magical Cunning or finish a short or long rest
effects: You gain temporary hit points equal to your Warlock level + your Charisma modifier.
Choose up to five creatures you can see; each gains temporary hit points equal to half your Warlock level + your Charisma modifier.

feature_defs.trigger: when you or an ally within 60 feet is about to make a death saving throw
effects: The creature regains hit points equal to half its hit point maximum and can end the Prone condition on itself.
Each creature of your choice within 30 feet of the creature takes radiant damage equal to 2d8 + your Charisma modifier and is blinded until the end of the current turn.
limits: Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.
